text:
COPY
Sent for the information of
Mr. William G. Harley
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA. ILLINOIS
March 10, 1961
Dr. Tracy F. Tyler
University of Minnesota
301 Johnston Hall
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
Dear Tracy s
Having just received notification that Walter Emery has ac¬
cepted the Journal editorship, 1 wanted to take this oppor¬
tunity to thank you for the help you have given me during my
months with the haeb. it has been a very pleasant relation¬
ship for me...and X hope, If you have any ideas for Improve¬
ment or for articles for the Journal, that you will continue
to send them along in the future.
Best regards.
/
(Mrs.) Betty
Publications Editor
BMCKtgj
cct Mr. William G. Harley
Mr. Harold E. Hill
